mapper.insert: INSERT INTO letter(letter_id, account, stamp, recipient, context,date) VALUES(#{letter_id}, #{account}, #{stamp}, #{recipient}, #{context},#{date});
mapper.select: SELECT l.*,u.name FROM user u, letter l WHERE l.account = u.account AND l.recipient = #{recipient} ORDER BY l.letter_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM letter WHERE recipient = "" AND account!=#{account} LIMIT 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE letter SET recipient = #{account} WHERE letter_id = #{letter_id};
